guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • All-purpose flour
  • Baking soda
  • Baking powder
Tools
  • 2 Baking sheets
  • Assorted mixing bowls
  • measuring cups and spoons

lines.text: In a medium bowl, mix together the four, baking soda, and baking powder.
lines.text_raw: In a medium bowl, mix together the four, baking soda, and baking powder.

lines.text: In a large bowl, whip together the butter, Crisco, sugar, vanilla, and egg.
lines.text_raw: In a large bowl, whip together the butter, Crisco, sugar, vanilla, and egg.

lines.text: Slowly add the flour mixture to the sugar and butter mix, until throughly mixed.
lines.text_raw: Slowly add the flour mixture to the sugar and butter mix, until throughly mixed.

lines.text: Using a measuring spoon, make small 2 tbsp balls and place them on the baking sheet, leaving about three inches in between each cookie.
lines.text_raw: Using a measuring spoon, make small 2 tbsp balls and place them on the baking sheet, leaving about three inches in between each cookie.

lines.text: Once one sheet is filled, put it in the oven and bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes.
lines.text_raw: Once one sheet is filled, put it in the oven and bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes.

lines.text: Continue baking batches of cookies in the same fashion as the first, swapping sheets between batches.
lines.text_raw: Continue baking batches of cookies in the same fashion as the first, swapping sheets between batches.

lines.text: Once all of the cookies are done, leave them out to cool for about 15 minutes.
